subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage limits on GPT-4o, currently up to 80 messages every 3 hours. Higher limits on GPT-4o mini.
5x more usage than the free tier, with a limit of approximately 100 messages every 8 hours for Claude 3.5 Sonnet.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High (estimated >70% of power users opt for subscriptions like ChatGPT Plus or Claude Pro for better access and reduced downtime).
pricing_analysis.trend: The market is seeing a rapid decrease in price-per-token while model capabilities increase. Top-tier models from OpenAI and Anthropic are now directly competitive on price. A significant trend is the emergence of highly efficient, smaller models (e.g., GPT-4o mini, Claude 3 Haiku) at extremely low costs. Subscription models are solidifying as the primary consumer access method, while pay-per-token remains the standard for developers and enterprises, with increasing differentiation between self-hosted (like Meta's Llama) and API-based models.
